Pour ce faire, Assiba Fabrise Rose en dehors de son activité, vend des mèches et des produits cosmétiques à son domicile depuis une vingtaine d’année. Assiba Fabrise Rose s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Assiba Fabrise Rose sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe NONVIGNON 7, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The Nonvignon 7 group is made up of three friends who live in the same district. The representative of the group, whose name is Assiba Fabrise Rose, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. She is 37 years old and, while she did not attend school, she learned the hairdressing trade. She is married to a man called Maurice and the couple has two children, who are both at school. The couple lives with their children. Assiba Fabrise Rose and her husband cover the family expenses between them. In order to do this, Assiba Fabrise Rose has, in addition to her hairdressing activity, been selling hair extensions and cosmetic products from her home for the past 20 years. She gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets. With a view to satisfying customer demand and in order to increase her turnover and income, Assiba Fabrise Rose is requesting, together with the other members of Nonvignon 7 group, a fourth loan from Alidé. The previous loans have been repaid in full.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and cosmetics.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr: Koffi vit avec sa conjointe et leurs 02 enfants qui vont à l‘école  à Lomé. Mr Koffi quant à lui est ouvrier dans une société de la place. Pour pouvoir joindre les deux bouts et assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille, il a ouvert une boutique dans laquelle il revend des denrées alimentaires. Sa femme est impliquée dans son activité et il est à quatrième prêt à WAGES. Ce prêt lui permettra de s’approvisionner en marchandises (riz, huile végétale, tomate en boite, sucre, détergents…). A l’avenir, mr Koffi voudrait devenir un grossiste et pouvoir assurer les moindres besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Koffi lives with his wife and their two children, who go to school in Lomé. Koffi himself is a laborer in a local company.In order to make ends meet and ensure a bright future for his family, he has opened a shop in which he sells groceries. His wife is also involved in his business and he is on his fourth loan from WAGES. This loan will enable him to get fresh supplies of rice, vegetable oil, canned tomatoes, sugar, detergents...In the future Koffi would like to become a wholesaler to be able to ensure his family's most basic needs.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is 48 years old and lives in Cahayag, Tudela. She is married with one child. 

To earn a living, Corazon has a business selling snacks in the community. She earns about 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) each month doing this type of work. Corazon has a requested a loan  to purchase additional ingredients such as flour, sugar, oil, etc.

Corazon has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Corazon would like to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients such as flour, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire

texts.fr: Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire âgée de 55 ans, est mariée à un certain de Ismaël. Le couple a un enfant qui n'est pas scolarisé. Le couple vit ensemble avec leur enfant. Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire assiste son mari dans les diverses charges de la maison. Pour ce faire, Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire vend des thermos, des produits de toilettes (couches, layettes, etc.) depuis douze ans environ. En vue de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire sollicite pour la sixème fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Les crédits précédemment obtenus ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire, who is 55 years old, is married to a man named Ismaël. The couple has one child who is not at school and they live with their child. Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire did not attend school. She helps out her husband with the various household expenses, and in order to do this, has been selling thermos flasks and clothing (nappies, babywear, etc.) for around 12 years. With a view to satisfying customer demand, Cyanath Anne-Marie Claire is requesting a sixth loan from Alidé. The previous loans that she has been granted have been repaid in full.

loans.use: to buy thermos flasks, and babywear.

loans.name: Mariela Cecibel

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal La Sirena se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio La Sirena en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar vive la señorita Valeria, tiene 24 años, está soltera y  vive en casa de sus padres,  estudia Marketing en una Universidad en Manta.
 
Valeria además de dedicarse a sus estudios también se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo, zapatillas y productos de Cyzone (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta aunque la mayoría de sus ventas las realiza en el centro donde ella estudia ya que tiene varios clientes, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Lleva más 4 años con su negocio el cual le permite sacar adelante sus estudios.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatillas, cremas y perfumes. Lleva 4 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con esto empezó su negocio el cual le da  ganancias  para solventar los gastos de sus estudios.
 
Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y ser empresaria.
texts.en:
“La Sirena” Communal Bank meets every fifteen days in the La Sirena neighborhood in Manta.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited during all seasons of the year and for being a city of unsurpassed beauty with many tourist attractions.  In this place, lives Valeria.  She is 24 years old and single.  She lives in her parents’ home and studies Marketing at the university in Manta.  

In addition to her studies, Valeria is engaged in trade, selling all styles of clothing, shoes, and Cyzone products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and accessories for ladies).  She sells door-to-door although she conducts most of her sales at the center where she studies.  She has several customers there and she extends credit and collects payments every fifteen days.  She has been engaged in this business for four years and it helps her move forward with her studies.  

This loan is for the purchase of clothing, shoes, creams, and perfume.  She had been involved in the communal bank for four years and she enjoys it because it enabled her to start her business, which provides her with earnings to pay for her educational expenses.   Her dream is to complete her studies and become a businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, creams, and perfume.

loans.name: Julia Rosario

texts.es:
La cliente Julia, vive en Guayaquil. Ella comienza su negocio de comida y cabinas telefónicas hace varios años atrás cuando tenia la necesidad de tener mas ingresos en su familia. Poco a poco puso un restaurante y con varios ingresos incluso los de su esposo también tuvieron unas cabinas telefónicas.    

En la actualidad tienen dos negocio, pero quieren seguri progresando para darle lo mejor a sus hijos ya que tiene tres que estudian en escuelas fiscales (en la foto Julia aparece con uno de sus hijos). 

Para poder capitalizar los estudios de sus hijos que ahora han entrado ha clases necesitan el crédito para los utiles escolares que le piden.
texts.en:
Julia lives in Guayaquil. She started her business of selling food and managing phone booths several years ago when she needed more income for her family. Over time she was able to open a restaurant and have multiple sources of income. Her husband also has a few phone booths that he manages.

Julia currently manages two businesses, but she wants to keep progressing so that she can provide the best for her children. She has three children who are studying at state schools. One of her children appears with her in the photo. Julia’s children have already enrolled in their classes, but she needs to fund their studies. She needs a loan for the school supplies her children have requested.

loans.use: to buy schools supplies for her children.

loans.name: Condrada

texts.en:
Condrada is 69 years old and lives in Libertad Alto, Sinacaban. She is married with five children.
 
To earn a living, Condrada has a business selling dried fish in the community. She earns about 6,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) each month doing this type of work. Condrada has requested a loan to purchase additional dried fish to sell.

Condrada has been a member of PMPC for eight years. In the future, Condrada would like to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Annie Rose

texts.en:
Annie Rose is married with two children. Annie Rose  is 35 years old and lives in Tipan, Sinacaban.

Annie Rose sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 6,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) doing this type of work. 

She has requested a loan for 30,000 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

Annie Rose has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Annie Rose hope to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is married with three children. Rita is 54 years old and lives in Macabayao, Jimenez.

Rita sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 2,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

Rita has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Rita hope to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Nim

texts.en:
Originally from Kampong Cham province’s Ou Reang Ov district, Nim is 37 years old and married. She has three children, two of whom still rely on her, as one is helping with the household chores and a remaining one is in school. To deal with the daily cost of living, she grows paddy rice and cassava on 3 hectares each of farmland with the support from her husband. The current business has returned her about 38,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

Nim joins VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) as a first-loan-cycle client. She will spend her requested loan in the amount of 4,000,000 KHR in order to buy potash and pay plowing fees for her rice farm, and to pay labor costs for her cassava farm. She hopes that she can gain a high profit to better her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy potash, pay the plowing fee for her rice farm, and to pay for labor costs for her cassava farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Faosiath Adédjokè

texts.fr: Faosiath Adédjokè, âgée de 28 ans est mariée à un certain Farouk. Le couple n'a pas d'enfant. Faosiath Adédjokè n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, Faosiath Adédjokè vend des mèches et des produits cosmétiques (produits de cheveux) depuis cinq ans par la méthode de distribution. Faosiath Adédjokè s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin et au Togo. En vue de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Faosiath Adédjokè sollicite pour la sixième fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Les crédits précédemment obtenus ont tous été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Faosiath Adédjokè, who is 28 years old, is married to a man named Farouk. The couple does not have any children. Faosiath Adédjoké did not attend school. In order to provide for her needs, she has been selling hair extensions and hair products for the past five years through the distribution system. She gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets and in Togo. With a view to satisfying customer demand, she is requesting a sixth loan from Alidé. The previous loans she has been granted have been repaid in full.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and hair products.

loans.name: Leni

texts.en:
Leni is 47 years old and lives in Tipan, Sinacaban. She is married with four children. 

Leni sells a variety of products to earn a living. She has had this business for 15 years. Each month, she earns 5000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) doing this work. She has requested a loan for 14,900 PHP to purchase additional products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

Leni has been a member of PMPC for five years.  In the future, Leni hopes to save money for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is married with five children. She is 56 years old and lives in Poblacion, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Tessie sells clothes to earn a living. She has had this business for 15 years. Each month, she earns 10,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) from her business. She has requested a loan of 14,000 PHP to purchase more clothes to sell.

Tessie has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Tessie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Elias Esau

texts.es:
Elias, vive actualmente con sus padres, está  soltero y no tiene hijos. El se dedica a la venta y compra de ganado para obtener ingresos necesarios y apoyar a su familia;  este oficio lo inicio desde hace 2 años y lo realiza de lunes a sábado, por el momento no ha tenido problemas con el negocio.
El préstamo que requiere lo invertirá en la compra de ganado y alimento para engordarlo; este le ayudara para que incrementar el inventario  y también para aportar a su familia.
Su sueño es seguir  trabajando, ampliar el negocio y tener su familia propia.
texts.en:
Elias currently lives with his parents. He is single and has no children. Elias buys and sells livestock so that he can generate the necessary income to support his family. He started in this trade two years ago and works Monday through Saturday. At the moment, he does not have any problems with his business.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy livestock and feed for fattening the animals. This will help him to increase his inventory so that he can support his family. His dreams include continuing his work, expanding his business, and having a family of his own.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed for fattening the animals.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  Virgen de Fatima está en su 6° ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para saber la situación de cada una de ellas, donde 3 integrantes están por debajo  de la línea de pobreza, es decir con un ingreso muy bajo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien se dedica a las ventas, tiene una pequeña despensa en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas. Cuenta que gracias al esfuerzo que está haciendo ha ido creciendo lentamente y quiere seguir haciéndolo.
Solicita de esta ayuda para poder seguir y trabajando y comprar insumos para surtir su negocio, como ser verduras, comestibles, frutas, bebidas y demás, pudiendo así concretar su plan de negocios
texts.en:
The group called Virgen de Fatima is in its 6th cycle with the program for groups of women. They are participating in the study for the elimination of poverty. Three of the members are below the poverty line, which is to say that they have a very low income.

One of the members is Maria, who makes a living in sales. She has a small grocery store where she works every day from the early morning hours. She says that thanks to her efforts her business has been growing slowly and she wants to continue working on it. She is requesting this assistance in order to continue working and to buy supplies to stock her business, such as vegetables, foods, fruit, drinks and other products. In this way she can carry out her business plan.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, foods, fruit, drinks and more

loans.name: Saret's Group

texts.en: Saret is married and has four children. She is 51 and a local farmer from Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. To cover her family's daily food consumption, she grows paddy rice on two and a half hectares, and works for others for a fee. The current business has returned her about 23,600 Cambodian Riels (KHR) per day. With this loan, Saret is a third-time borrower with Kiva partner VisionFund. She has managed to repay her previous loans already, and they have supported her business and improved her lifestyle at a good pace. For this cycle, she joins a group of three to apply for a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy potash, rice seed, and insecticide, and to pay fees for plowing. She hopes that this will help her improve her yield.

loans.use: To buy potash, rice seed, and insecticide, and to pay for plowing.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Unidas está en su ciclo número 4º  ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde todas están trabajando por mejorar su nivel de vida y la de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Marta, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, es decir con ingresos estables, pero igual ella está luchando por mejorar y mantener su nivel de vida. Ella cuenta que realiza manualidades,  que vende a sus clientes, y con lo que le está yendo bien. Está trabajando arduamente para mejorar su vida e ir creciendo.
La Sra. Marta solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para realizar sus manualidades (hilos, telas, etc), lo que le ayudará  a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras están recibiendo, ya que por medio de ello podrán mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Mujeres Unidas [United Women] is in its 4th cycle. They are participating in the study to eliminate poverty, in which all are working to improve their quality of life for themselves and their families.

One of the members is Marta. The last survey showed her to be in level three of the levels of poverty, which means she has stable income. Nonetheless, she is struggling to improve and maintain her quality of life. She says that she makes handicrafts which she sells to her customers, and that this business has been going well for her. She is working hard to improve her life and to keep growing.

Marta requests the loan to buy supplies to make her handicrafts (thread, fabric, etc.), which will help her carry out her business plan and thus help improve her income. She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her group members are receiving, since through this assistance they will be able to improve their income.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, etc., to make handicrafts

loans.name: Chunleng's Group

texts.en:
Living in Kampong Cham province, Chunleng is 37 years old and a widow. She has three children, two of whom are still in school. As a single mother who needs to support the entire household alone, she engages in rice cropping on one hectare area. She has been in this business for 12 years and is able to earn about 16,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first microloan for Chunleng with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of three to apply for the new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for a plowing fee for her farmland. She has high hopes that she can increase her income to sustain her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to pay for plowing fee for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Los Hijos Del Sol Group

texts.es:
Jessica tiene 32 años es casada con 03 hijos pequeños, su esposo trabaja como obrero, con la finalidad de ayudar con el sustento del hogar siempre ha trabajado en diferentes oficios, para no descuidar a sus hijos decidió emprender un negocio propio, fue así que se inicio con la venta de jugos y dulces. Jessica prepara los dulces en su casa y sale a venderlos tanto en la mañana como en la tarde, gracias a su trabajo ha podido prosperar y darle a sus hijos mejores estudios. Él préstamo que ha solicitado le servirá para implementar su negocio con la compra de insumos para la preparación de jugos y dulces, más adelante le gustaría ampliar su negocio en un lugar más grande.
Jessica esta agradecida por este préstamo que la ayudara a aumentar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos, en la foto viste chaleco color rojo.
texts.en:
Jessica is 32 years old and has three young children. Her husband works as a laborer. In order to help with maintaining her household, Jessica has always worked in different trades. However, she decided to start her own business because she did not want to neglect her children. Jessica decided to begin selling juices and sweets. She prepares the sweets at home and then sells them in the mornings and the afternoons. Thanks to her work, she has been able to prosper and give her children a better education.

The loan she is requesting will be used to keep her business in operation. She will buy supplies for preparing juices and sweets. Going forward, she would like to expand her business by moving it to a larger place. Jessica is appreciative of this loan since it will help to increase her sales and improve her income. In the photo, she is wearing a red vest.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing juices and sweets.

loans.name: Inmanuel Salvador

texts.es: Inmanuel, es un joven de 24 años de edad estudiante de la carrera de ingeniería en sistemas, su mayor sueño es culminar sus estudios superiores y estudiar otra carrera universitaria, es un joven que le gusta la ingeniería y con sus conocimientos y preparación espera encontrar un empleo digno para apoyar a sus padres quienes con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio le apoyan para el pago de sus estudios, el crédito que solicita es para pagar el curso de titulación ya que solamente le falta meses para dicho curso el cual tiene que pagar de contado y no esta en su alcance este gasto.
texts.en: Inmanuel is 24 years old and he is studying for a degree in systems engineering.  His greatest dream is to complete his higher education and study for another college degree.  He is a young man who enjoys engineering and with his knowledge and preparation, he hopes to find a decent job in order to support his parents, who supported him with a great deal of hard work and sacrifice to pay for his education.  The loan he is requesting is to pay for the “curso de titulación” [official degree registration].   He is only months away from completing this course, for which he has to pay cash, and this expense is not within his reach.

loans.use: to pay for his “curso de titulación” [official degree registration].

loans.name: Mariana Alejandrina

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Santa Ana, conocida por sus bellos paisajes y por sus hermosos balnearios de agua dulce que son visitados por muchos turistas, cada 15 días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Nueva Esperanza.

En este lugar vive la señora Mariana, tiene 61 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esa relación tiene tres  hijos mayores de edad, una de ellos aun vive en su casa.

Doña Mariana para salir adelante y mucho más después de la muerta de su esposo  se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, zapatos y varios productos de bazar y bisutería, ella todos los días arma un pequeño puesto en el centro de la ciudad lugar donde muchos comerciantes ofrecen sus productos. Trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00  hasta las 18h00, los días que mas vende son los fines de semana ya que en esos días son las ferias del cantón y salen muchas personas del campo a abastecerse de víveres y allí ellos también comprar su mercadería. Tiene más de 30 años este negocio que le ha permitido salir sola adelante y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como ropa, zapatos, bisutería entre otras cosas que vende. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace más de 15 años  y le gusta porque con los créditos ella ha podido salir adelante.
 
Su sueño es tener un local.
texts.en:
In the city of Santa Ana, known for its beautiful scenery and fresh water hot springs which are very popular with tourists, the members of the Nueva Esperanza [New Hope] communal bank meet every two weeks.

Mariana lives here. She is 61 years old. Her husband died several years ago. They had three children, who are all grown up now, though one child still lives at home with her.

To get ahead in life, especially after the death of her husband, Mariana sells all kinds of clothes, footwear, jewellery and miscellaneous items. She goes to work every day at a small stall in the city centre. A lot of traders sell their products in this area. She works every day from 8 in the morning to 6 in the evening. She sells more at the weekends, as this is when county fairs are held and a lot of people travel to town from the country to sell their food goods and to buy supplies also. She has been running this business for more than 30 years. It has enabled her to keep going on her own and to provide the best for her children.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as clothes, footwear, jewellery, and other items that she sells. 

She has been a member of this communal bank for more than 15 years. She likes it because the loans have allowed her to get ahead. 

Her dream is to have a business premises.

loans.use: to buy clothes, footwear, and jewellery, etc.

loans.name: Fe Y Alegria Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento FE Y ALEGRIA, Está  compuesto por ocho integrantes todas mujeres,   la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Brenda tiene 29 años y tres hijos de las edades de 9, 6 y 2 años,  su actividad es la venta de refrigerios y sándwich en su puesto d venta que se encuentra en la localidad de Pedro Lorenzo,  la Sra. Brenda se levanta desde tempranas horas de la mañana para elaborar sus sándwich y también para prepara el almuerzo para su familia, después sale a vender todo esto por la mañana, con el dinero del crédito la Sra. Brenda comprara insumos como fideo, papa para la elaboración de sus refrigerios, Sra. Brenda es una persona responsable y trabajadora esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que le brinda para tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir adelante superándose por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Fe Y Alegria” (Faith and Joy) consists of eight members, all women. The bank president is Sra. Brenda, who is 29 years old and has three children (ages 9, 6, and 2). She sells snacks and sandwiches from a vending stall in the town of Pedro Lorenzo. Sra. Brenda wakes up in the early morning hours so that she can prepare sandwiches, as well as lunches for her family. Afterwards she sells everything throughout the morning.

Sra. Brenda will use the money from her loan to buy supplies such as noodles and potatoes for preparing her snacks. She is a responsible and hardworking person who is grateful to Emprender for the financial support she has received. This has enabled her to have a better quality of life and to continue succeeding for the welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making snacks.

loans.name: Jessica Del Carmen

texts.es: Jessica, es una joven de 23 años de edad labora como asistente para una empresa privada, estudia la carrera de contabilidad pública y finanzas, ella es casada y recibe aun apoyo de su madre siendo la única hija que recibe apoyo de estudios debido a que su familia es muy pobre y ella espera en el futuro con título en mano aspirar a un mejor empleo para ayudar a su madre con sus ingresos. Solicita este crédito para poder pagar el curso de titulación para culminar su carrera.
texts.en:
Jessica is 23-year-old young woman who works as a assistant for a private company. Jessica studies public accounting and finance. She is married and still receives support from her mother being the only daughter and student because her family is poor. 

Jessica hopes in the future, with degree in hand, to aspire after a better job in order help her mother with her income. She is requesting this loan to be able to pay for her certification course to finish her degree..

loans.use: pay for her certification course.

loans.name: Seak's Group

texts.en: Seak, a 50-year-old widow, is an inhabitant from Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chor district. She struggles in earning a decent income to support her living via rice cropping and soybean planting as her primary income. To better feed her family, she also works for others for a fee during her spare time. The current business that she has been with for 24 years has helped her to earn about 29,400 KHR per day. She and other three fellow group members have been with VisionFund (Kiva's partner) for one past cycle and has fully repaid their original loan with VisionFund. The previous loan has enabled her to support her business as well as her living status. Now, she is a group leader. She and her joint members are seeking for 1,100,000 KHR each. Seak will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor costs. She highly hopes that she can gain high crop output and gain multiple incomes so that she can buy cows for raising extra income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor costs

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en:
Everlyne is 33 years old and lives in Imelda, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 3 children. To earn a living, Everlyne has a business selling a variety of foods as snacks. She earns about 10,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. Everlyne has requested a loan to purchase more raw ingredients for her snack vending.

Everlyne has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Everlyne would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more raw ingredients for her snack vending business

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
This is Jonalyn. She previously accessed an 16,000 PHP loan that she used buy more quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan for her to purchase raw ingredients and supplies needed in her business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Jonalyn dreams that her business will grow bigger and hopes to have a good life. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Mujeres Por El Bien Comun Group

texts.es:
Mujeres por el bien comun se llama este grupo de Ciudad del Este, tiene un gran número de integrantes, donde ellas están en su ciclo uno, con muchas ganas de crecer y de ir mejorando sus vidas por medio del trabajo en conjunto. Tienen como meta el crecimiento de cada una no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Miguela, quien se dedica a la venta de perfumes y fragancias de variadas clases, y cuenta que tiene muy buena clientela porque siempre tiene muy buena variedad y así cautiva a sus clientes. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y con ansias de crecer y ser una gran microempresaria. Pide este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de perfumes para damas y caballeros, y así seguir invirtiendo en su microemprendimiento.
texts.en:
This group from Ciudad del Este is called “Mujeres Por el Bien Común” [Women for the Common Good] and has a large membership.  The group is in its first cycle, and the members are eager to grow and improve their lives by working together.  Their goal is the growth of each member, not only financially, but personally as well.  

One of the members is Miguela, who is engaged in selling various types of perfumes and fragrances.  She says that she has a very good clientele because she always has very good variety and, in this way, attracts customers.  She is a hardworking person eager to grow and become a great small business owner.  She is requesting this loan to purchase perfume for ladies and gentlemen, and in this way, continue investing in her micro-entrepreneurship.

loans.use: to purchase perfume for ladies and gentlemen.

loans.name: Nidia

texts.es:
La Sra. Nidia tiene 58 años, es madre soltera de tres hijos todos mayores e independientes. Ella empezó trabajando desde muy joven vendiendo bijouterie por la calle, después de mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro comprar joyas de plata y venderlos.
Este trabajo le genero mejores ganancias y actualmente ya tiene una clientela bien formada y el negocio le está resultando muy bien. Gracias a ello pudo mantenerse y darle a sus hijos una mejor vida.
Ella solicita de este crédito para la compra de joyas de plata para la venta, como ser anillos, cadenas, pulseras y demás, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas. Ella está muy agradecida por la oportunidad que ella y su familia está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Nidia is 58 years old. She is a single mother with three children, all of whom are grown and independent. She began working when she was very young selling jewelry in the street. After much effort and dedication she was able to buy silver jewelry to sell. This work has generated better profits for her and presently she has a well formed customer base and the business has been going very well for her. Thanks to her business she has been able to provide for herself and to give her children a better life.

She is requesting this loan to buy silver jewelry to sell, such as rings, chains, bracelets and others, and with this she will be able to continue with her sales. She is very grateful for the opportunity that she and her family are receiving.

loans.use: to buy jewelry to sell

loans.name: Elykhen Isabel

texts.es: Elykhen, es casada tiene 24 años es una joven activa que le gusta estar informada entorno a la situación mundial en la que vivimos, estudia la carrera de licenciatura en derecho, también estudia estilismo e inglés, le pone mucho empeño a su carrera de abogado porque su mayor deseo es ayudar a las personas de escasos recursos a defender sus derechos, en la actualidad no tiene un empleo, pero tiene la esperanza de que una vez finalizada su carrera encuentre trabajo. Para lograr su objetivo necesita pagar el curso de titulación, por lo que solicita el apoyo de crédito para hacer posible este pago.
texts.en:
Elykhen is a married, active 24-year-old woman who likes to be informed of the global situation and environment in which we live. She is studying for a law degree as well as fashion design and English. Elykhen works hard at her law career because her greatest wish is to help poor people defend their rights. 

Currently Elykhen does not have a job, but she has hope that once her degree is completed, she'll find work. To achieve this objective, she needs to pay for her degree. To make this payment possible, she is requesting a loan.

loans.use: pay for her degree.

loans.name: Sreymom

texts.en: Sreymom is a 25-year-old mother of two children living in the Kror Kor district of Pursat province in Cambodia. One of her children is in school while the second one is too young for schooling. To deal with the daily cost of living, she does rice cultivation as her main source of income. To better feed the family, she and her husband sell firewood during their spare time. She has had this business for 8 years, earning about 30,000 KHR per day. Sreymom is new to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is seeking a first loan in the amount of 2,000,000 KHR in order to buy potash for her farmland and to fix her house. She hopes that she can fix her house quickly so that she can provide a decent shelter for her family.

loans.use: To buy potash for her farmland

loans.name: Senhorinha

texts.en:
Senhorinha is 30 years old and she is applying for a loan of $1.000.00 to improve her business. She is married and has 7 children  She started her garden in 2001 with her own working capital of $20.00. She earns a good income from her business.

She will use her loan to buy some vegetables to keep her store stocked. She is a very hard working woman and running this business has become her regular activity for the past 13 years. She wants to make her business bigger and improve her living conditions in the future. Her husband is a teacher, and she is happy that TRM (Tuba Rai Metin ) has offered loans for poor people.

loans.use: To buy vegetables

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 43 years old and lives in Gil Sanchez, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte in the Philippines.. She is married with 4 children.

To earn a living, Josephine has a business selling a variety of foods. She earns about 3000 each month doing this type of work. Josephine has requested a loan to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business.

Josephine has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Josephine would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business

location.town: Liloy-Gil Sanchez, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Roohi

texts.en:
Roohi is a 38-year-old woman who is living in Punjab, Pakistan, with her husband and three children. 

Since 2005 her husband has been running a clothing shop which is the only source of income for their family. 

Roohi has requested a loan from Kiva partner Brac Pakistan for her husband to purchase clothes, threads and elastic. This will help her husband to increase his net income and savings. She will use any profit amount for the education of her chilldren. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase clothes, thread and elastic.

loans.name: Run's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Kror Kor district of Pursat province in Cambodia, Run is 29 years old and a mother of one small child. 

For her, rice cropping, clothing tailoring, and pig-raising are the various sources of her family’s income. She has been involved in her current business for a long time and she is able to earn up to 18,500 KHR per day. This is the fifth cycle for Run with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Her past loan, which she has repaid fully, has supported business at a good pace. 

Now,she forms a group of two to apply for a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to renovate her house and to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes that she can fix her house to a good condition for her family.

loans.use: To renovate her house and to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Buena Ventura

texts.es:
Buena Ventura es una persona muy trabajadora, este es su segundo crédito en Kiva, el anterior lo utilizo en la compra de llantas para su tienda, y con ello pudo cumplir con sus clientes y pedidos que también tenia. El cuenta que quiere seguir trabajando, ya que este es el único medio con el que puede ayudar a su familia y darles lo que necesitan para poder seguir creciendo.
Solicita este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de cubiertas con lo cual podrá mejorar su stock de productos y seguir cumpliendo con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece por este nueva ayuda que recibe.
texts.en: Buena Ventura is a hardworking person.  This is his second loan with Kiva.  He used the previous loan to purchase tires for his shop, and this enabled him to serve his customers and also fill orders that he had.  He says that he wants to continue working because this is the only way he can help his family and provide them with what they need to continue growing.  He is requesting this loan to purchase tires, which will enable him to improve his stock of products and continue meeting customer demand.  He is grateful for this new assistance that he is receiving.

loans.use: to purchase tires.

loans.name: Julio Adalberto

texts.es: Don julio de 40 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto a sus 2 hijos y su esposa. Él se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de jocotes, maíz y frijol. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 13 años de su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que él consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Julio is 40 years old and lives in his own house alongside his wife and two children.  Julio makes a living in agriculture - he grows corn, beans and jocote trees.  He has been doing this work for 13 years and it is his source of income.  Julio is hard-working, responsible and well-known in the area because of his big heart and his being friendly with others.  Given that it is the sowing season, Julio is now getting prepared and so has decided to apply for a new loan to invest in buying seeds, fertilisers, insecticides and more.  What Julio wants most is to have an abundant harvest that is better than previous ones.  It is with his harvests that Julio supports his family.  Julio trusts God that with help, dedication and determination in his work, he will achieve his dream of giving his family a better quality of living.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, insecticides and more.

loans.name: Higo Elias

texts.es: Don higo de  32 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, herbicida, etc. don higo tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica
texts.en: Thirty-two-year-old Higo lives with his life partner and their two children in their own home.  He grows corn and sorghum for a living.  He has been working in farming for several years and this has given him a lot of experience, which allows him to reap better harvests.  He sells his harvests in the areas surrounding his community and he has a lot of clientele who prefer him for his quality, his good prices, and above all for his great customer service.  He needs to invest, which is why he is asking for a loan that will allow him to buy seed, insecticide, herbicide, etc.  Higo has good payment references among those who know him and he is very responsible.  He promises to be able to pay off his debt in the established time period and he is also confident that this will bring his household financial security.

loans.use: to buy seed, insecticide, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado 8 de Diciembre está en su primer ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres,  son mujeres trabajadoras  donde todas se ayudan por salir adelante. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para saber la situación de cada una de ellas.
La señora Genoveva es la presidenta en el comité y es muy activa, formo su grupo para poder trabajar en conjunto y salir adelante La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de animales para la cría, ya que a eso se dedica y con ello está saliendo adelante, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group known as 8 de Diciembre is in its first cycle with the program for groups of women. They are hardworking women who all help each other to get ahead. They are participating in the study for the elimination of poverty to better understand each member's situation.

Genoveva is the president of the group and is very active. She formed the group so they could work together and forge ahead. She requests this loan to buy animals to raise, since she makes a living raising animals and this has helped her move forward. The loan will help her carry out her business plan, which will in turn help her improve her income.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Shahida is a 47-year-old hardworking and diligent woman. She is living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, along with her husband and four children. Her husband is a janitor by profession, and he has a very low monthly income, because of which they are facing a lot of financial problems.

Shahida is a very responsible and skilled woman. She is using her tailoring skills to generate an alternative source of income for her family. She is very experienced in stitching clothes and dresses. She has been doing this work for 30 years. Her clients are very happy and well satisfied with her work. 

She has requested a loan from Kiva’s partner BRAC Pakistan to expand her business. She wants to open a tailoring centre in her house. She would purchase two new sewing machines so that her production would be increased. She would also purchase some threads and clothes for stitching purposes. She would pay her installments with the profit amount and pay for some household expenses. She is very hopeful that the loan will be a progressive one for her family.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 54 years old and lives in San Andres, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with two children. 

Rosa has a store and sells groceries and other consumable products. She is also engaged in a snack-vending activity and earns approximately 3,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, canned goods and other products.

Rosa has been a member of PMPC for almost four years. In the future, Rosa hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, canned goods and other products.

loans.name: Tekojoaju Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Tekojoaju está en su primer ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres,  son mujeres indígenas  donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, todas las miembros están en por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy escaso.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Marta, quien  a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, quiere ir mejorando su situación de pobreza, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artesanías, con lo cual trata de salir adelante y poder ayudar a su familia. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de materiales artesanal para poder seguir haciendo sus artesanías y luchar por su familia, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Tekojoaju Group is in its first cycle of the women's committee program. They are indigenous women, all of them working and helping themselves to get ahead. They are doing the survey of poverty elimination, and all of the women are below the line of poverty with very scarce income.

One of the members is Martha, who through effort, continuous work, and by applying the vital behaviors of a successful woman, wants to keep improving her impoverished situation. Martha works in the development and sale of handicrafts with which she is trying to get ahead to be able to help her family. She is very determined and hardworking woman. 

Martha is requesting a loan to purchase crafting materials to be able to keep making crafts and to fight for her family, which will help her realize her business plan and improve her income.

loans.use: buy supplies such as clay, paints, and brushes, and other things to make crafts.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente  vive junto a sus padres y sus hermanos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol  desde hace 5  años ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde siembra esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, y muy cercano a su vivienda, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la amacena en sacos asi como muestra la fotografía,  comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio, el desea realizar una nueva inversión que le permita aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, fertilizantes, abonos, etc. el cliente  tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: This borrower lives with his parents and brothers and has been making a living growing corn and beans for five years.  This valuable experience now allows him to grow better harvests.  The land where he sows his seeds is in an area with a lot of farming work, and is close to his home.  Once his harvest is ready, he stores it in bags, as shown in the photograph.  The member sells his product in the areas around his community and he has a good customer base and is liked because he sells top quality products, with good service and at accessible prices.  The borrower wants to invest again so that he can increase production.  So, he has applied to "Integral" for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure and more.  The members has a good credit rating and assures us that he will be able to pay off his debt.  He hopes that he will be able to give some financial stability to his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure and more.

loans.name: Rafael Armando

texts.es: Rafael de 44 años de edad, se dedica a cultivar la tierra.  Con mucha dedicación cultiva maíz y maicillo, lo cual le permite llevar el  pan de cada día a su hogar. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y responsable. Habita junto a su  grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y su hijo de 14 años de edad.  Junto a su esposa trabajan muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia. Gracias a los conocimientos en la agricultura es como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar, que es su principal fuente de ingresos, dado que es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida honradamente.  Con muchos deseos de superación decidió solicitar un crédito ya que necesita invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. para la siembra. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta forma logrará  tener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá tener  una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en: Rafael is 44 years old and makes a living working the land.  He grows corn and sorghum with a lot of dedication and this allows him to earn a living to support his household.  Rafael is hard-working, honest and responsible.  He lives with his family - his wife and 14-year-old son.  Alongside his wife, Rafael works very hard to help the family prosper.  Thanks to his knowledge of agriculture, Rafael is able to support the family.  Agriculture is the family's main source of income and the only way they know how to make an honest living.  With a great desire to move ahead in life, Rafael decided to apply for a loan as he needs to invest in buying necessary agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilisers, insecticides and more for sowing.  Rafael trusts in God and in his work that, with this investment, he will have an abundant harvest that will give him and his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers and insecticides.

loans.name: Mario Ernesto

texts.es: Don Mario de 52 años de edad, vive con su esposa y su hijo de 6 años, es comerciante de frutas y verduras.  Desde hace 12 años. Utiliza su vehículo en el que coloca cajas de madera para exhibir las frutas y verduras, que vende al por menor, es decir a todos los transeúntes y habitantes de la ciudad y cantones aledaños, don Mario solicita un crédito para poder comprar frutas y verduras por mayor y asi seguir con su negocio ya que tiene mucha clientela que lo busca por sus productos que son muy frescos y a recias accesibles y asi el podrá seguir llevando el sustento diario a su hogar
texts.en: Mario is 52 years old and lives with his wife and 6 year old son.  He has been selling fruits and vegetables for twelve years.  He uses his vehicle, in which he places wooden boxes to exhibit the fruits and vegetables. He sells retail, mainly to all the passers-by and residents of the city and surrounding cantons.  Mario is requesting a loan to purchase wholesale fruits and vegetables and thus, continue with his business.  He has many customers who are looking for products that are very fresh at affordable prices.  In this way, he will be able to continue bringing daily sustenance to his home.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es: Carlos es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus 2  hijos es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años maíz y sorgo. Carlos  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Carlos is a man who is very responsible when it comes to his obligations to his household as he has always been known as someone who offers his children the best.  He currently lives with his wife and their two children.  He is a very hardworking farmer who has always done his work gladly and enthusiastically.  Every year he grows corn and sorghum.  Carlos wants to increase his sales, which is why he visited the offices of INTEGRAL to ask for a loan that will allow him to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, and pesticides, among other things.  He would like to be able to count on the help he has requested as he does not have any other sources of income and this will allow him to keep bringing home the daily bread without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, and pesticides, among other things

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es: Don Lucas de 61 años de edad,  es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar. Actualmente vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres  hijos, es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y frijol.  Don Lucas  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas y también poder mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía, ya que los terrenos de donde el reside son bastante pedregoso  y montañoso. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Sixty-one-year-old Lucas is a man who is very responsible when it comes to his home obligations.  He currently lives with his life partner and their three children.  He is a very hardworking corn and bean farmer who has always done his work happily and enthusiastically.  Lucas wants to increase his sales, which is why he is asking for a loan that will allow him to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, and pesticides, and will also allow him to improve the land he grows on, which is pictured in the photograph, as the land where he lives is pretty rocky and mountainous.  He would like to be able to count on the help he has requested as he does not have any other sources of income and this will allow him to keep bringing home the daily bread without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, etc., and to improve his land

loans.name: Gloria Elcidia

texts.es:
Gloria, requiere optar por un nuevo préstamo para seguir invirtiendo en la venta de frutas y verduras de toda variedad; este le permitirá comprar sandias, papayas, piñas, uvas; cebollas, tomates, repollos, zanahorias, entre otros.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a surtir mas el negocio con mercadería fresca y bonita; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Gloria needs another loan to keep investing in selling all kinds of fruits and vegetables,  This will allow her to buy watermelons, papayas, pineapples, grapes, onions, tomatoes, cabbages, and carrots, among others. 

Her previous loan helped her stock her business with fresh, beautiful produce and her financial and family situations have improved.

loans.use: to buy watermelons, papayas, pineapples, grapes, onions, tomatoes, cabbages, and carrots, among others

loans.name: Ear's Group

texts.en: Ear, a young mother of two kids, is 27 years old and a resident from Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. To strive for a living for herself and the rest of her family, she grows rice on one hectare area. This is the first loan for Ear with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She and the other borrower are seeking the same loan amount: 1,000,000 KHR each. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy potash and to pay for labor for her farmland. She has high hopes that she can make more income to expand her business to a larger scale.

loans.use: to buy potash and pay for labor fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Ignacio Bernabe

texts.es: Don Ignacio de 37 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, vive con  su esposa y sus 5 hijos,  se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y frijol con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante con su familia. Ignacio desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso ha solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, entre otras cosas,  y poder mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía que es donde realiza sus cosechas para seguir llevando el pan de cada dia a su hogar.
texts.en: Ignacio is 37 years old.  He is a very responsible man with home obligations and lives with his wife and five children.  He is a farmer who plants corn and beans and manages to get his family ahead with the profits he earns.  Ignacio wants to increase his sales, and for this reason, has requested a loan which will allow him to purchase seeds, organic fertilizer, and other items.  He will also be able to improve the land (shown in the photograph) where he grows his crops and continue bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, organic fertilizer, herbicides, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su compañera de vida y no tiene hijos, asimismo no posee familiares en el extranjero. El se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos tales como: maíz, pipián, plátano; el oficio lo aprendió con su padre, luego de que el falleció decidió hacerlo por su propia cuenta, ya tiene 3 años de llevarlo a cabo.
El préstamo que requiere optar le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios tales como: abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, pesticidas, entre otros.
Su sueño es agregar otro tipo de cultivo, ampliar sus cultivos y hacerle algunas modificaciones a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Manuel lives with his life partner and does not have children, nor does he have family abroad.  He grows staple grains for a living, such as corn, squash, and bananas.  He learned this trade from his father and after he passed away he decided to do it on his own.  He has been doing this work for three years now. 

He needs this loan to buy necessary farming supplies, such as fertilizer, herbicides, fungicides, insecticides, and pesticides, among others.

His dream is to add another kind of crop, to expand his crops, and to make some improvements to his home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, fungicides, insecticides, and pesticides, among other things.

loans.name: Cristian Camilo

texts.es:
Cristian de 21 años de edad, es un joven trabajador y con grandes por proyectos. Sueña con brindarle a su madre una mejor calidad de vida por lo cual  se dedica a la venta de ropa, lo que le permite colaborar con los gastos del hogar y financiar sus estudios universitarios.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía debido a la buena aceptación de sus productos y con el fin de cumplir con los encargos que le han solicitado.
Agradece a Dios por la oportunidad que le ha dado al generar una fuente de ingresos para el bienestar de su familia y su educación.
texts.en: Cristian is 21 years old.  He is a young worker with great plans.  He dreams of providing his mother with a better quality of life and for this reason, he is engaged in selling clothing.  This activity allows him to cover the household expenses and finance his university studies.  Currently, he is requesting a loan that he will invest in the purchase of merchandise due to the good acceptance of his products and in order to complete the orders that have been requested. He thanks God for the opportunity that he has been given to generate a source of income for the welfare of his family and his education.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Irilee

texts.en:
Irilee is 35 years old and lives in Poblacion, Sinacaban. She is single with two children. 

Irilee has a shop that sells ready-to-wear items. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan to purchase additional RTW's (ready-to-wear clothing) to sell. 

Irilee has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Irilee hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional RTW's (ready-to-wear clothing) to sell.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a farmer involved in the growing of coffee and bananas plus the rearing of animals. He has been into agriculture since 2007 after realising that it was the only source of income to look after the family. John is married with six children of 22, 18, 16, 14, 12 and 8 years respectively. Four of these children attend school, and he pays their school fees using the money from agriculture.

John wants a loan of 2,000,000 shillings to buy mulches for covering his coffee and banana plantation during this rainy season so that he is not affected when the dry season starts. His dream is to buy a machine to add value to his coffee beans, other than selling them in their raw form, so that he is able to realize more returns.

John is challenged by the price fluctuations on the market, seasonality of the agricultural production, as well the limited capital to invest in better agricultural equipment and paying the workers.

loans.use: To buy mulches for organic manure.

loans.name: Mirna Del Carmen

texts.es: Mirna de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, ella comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, Mirna es una mujer dedicada a su labor, luchadora siempre dispuesta a trabajar duro para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, herbicidas, herramienta, etc. doña Mirna tiene buenas referencias de pago y está segura que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en: Mirna is 42 years old.  She lives with her life companion and her two children.  She is engaged in farming, specifically the cultivation of corn and sorghum.  She has worked many years in this trade and has valuable experience that allows her to obtain better crops.  The farmland is located in an area where there is a lot of agriculture.  She markets in all the surrounding areas and already has many regular customers. People always prefer her products because they are of quality, really affordable and, in addition, the service is unbeatable.  Mirna is a woman dedicated to her work, a fighter always ready to work hard to achieve success.  She wants to take advantage of the peak of her business to increase production and, in this way, be able to have better earnings.  She needs to invest in inputs but needs capital.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan through Integral to purchase seeds, organic fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, tools, and other items.  Mirna has good payment references and is certain that she will be able to settle her debt on time while being able to provide her family with the life they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, organic fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, tools, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente  es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años maíz y sorgo.  El cliente desea incrementar sus ventas por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros y también poder mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía que es donde siembra sus cultivos. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: The client is a very responsible, hardworking man engaged in farming.  Every year, he plants corn and sorghum.  He wishes to increase his sales and for this reason, he is requesting a loan which will permit him to purchase seeds, organic fertilizers, pesticides, fertilizers, and other items as well as be able to improve the land (shown in the photo) where he plants his crops.  He wishes to have the requested assistance since he does not have other monetary income and, in this way, he will continue taking home the daily bread without any limitation.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, organic fertilizers, pesticides, fertilizers, and other items.

loans.name: Koe Pyahu Group

texts.es:
El grupo lleva por nombre Koe Pyahu que quiere decir nuevo amanecer, está en su segundo ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres,  son mujeres trabajadoras, donde todas se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde algunas de las señoras están con ingresos muy bajos.
La señora Mirian es la presidenta en el comité y cuenta que tiene una despensa bien surtida, donde la mayoría de sus vecinos compra de ella. Con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio ha podido montar su negocio y su deseo es poder seguir creciendo y el día de mañana tener una despensa bien surtida y con todo tipo de productos.
Solicita de este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de bebidas, carnes, frutas, y demás insumos para poder seguir invirtiendo en su tienda. Agradece por esta oportunidad que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The group named Koe Pyahu, which means 'new dawn', is in its second cycle of the women's committee program. They are women who work, and they all help each other to get ahead. They are doing the elimination of poverty survey, and some of the women have very low incomes.

Mirian is the president of the committee and says that she has a well-stocked grocery store, where the majority of her neighbors buy from her. She has been able to set up her business with a lot of effort and sacrifice, and her desire is to be able to keep growing and have a well-stocked store with all types of products in the future.

She asks for this loan to invest in buying drinks, meat, fruit and other supplies to be able to keep investing in her store. She is thankful for this opportunity, as it will be a lot of help to her.

loans.use: to buy drinks, meat, fruit and other supplies.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Nestor es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en casa de sus padres donde cuenta con un ambiente y se encuentra el dormitorio y la cocina en construcción; la  habitación es de ladrillo y el piso es de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona  Los Andes de la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente trabaja de empleado en una barraca donde se corta madera;  su trabajo consiste en la preparación de madera para cortes de medida por las mañanas y por las tardes se dedica a cargar y despachar los pedidos,  por las noches se dedica a estudiar. Nestor trabaja todos los días de la semana.   En su casa colabora a sus papas económicamente,  también se hace cargo de los servicios, pago de luz, vestimenta.
El crédito lo requiere para compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena, para terminar de construir un par de cuartos,  y así poder a mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Nestor es poder terminar sus estudios y tener negocio propio.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Nestor is single and has no children. He lives with his parents and has his own space with a bedroom and a kitchen that is under construction. This space is made of brick and has an earthen floor. The house is located in the Los Andes area, city of El Alto.

Nestor currently works cutting wood. In the morning, his job is to prepare the wood before it is cut in different sizes. In the afternoon, he delivers orders. He studies in the evenings. He works every day of the week, he helps his parents financially and he pays for the utilities and for the clothes.

He is requesting a loan to buy bricks, cement and sand to finish building two rooms and in this way improve his quality of life.

Nestor’s dream is to be able to finish his studies and to have his own business. This is the first time he requests a loan to IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement and sand to finish building two rooms at his parents' house in order to live more comfortably.

loans.name: Minda

texts.en:
Minda is married with four children. Minda is 50 years old and lives in Lupagan, Clarin.

Minda sells variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns PHP 2,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 50,000 to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

Minda has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Minda hope to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Nora Isabel

texts.es:
Nora de 21 años, es una joven cabeza de familia y madre de dos hijos de seis y cuatro años de edad. Su cónyuge nunca se hizo responsable de la paternidad, por lo cual Nora debió comenzar a trabajar a muy temprana edad, con el fin de garantizarles a sus hijos una calidad de vida digna. Por su carencia educativa las puertas al mundo laborar le fueron cerradas, por lo cual decidió subemplearse y crear su negocio dedicado a la fabricación y venta de arepas, actividad que alterna con la venta de gelatina. 
Asegura que su negocio en rentable, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de insumos como maíz y carbón. Sueña con mejorar la calidad de vida de su núcleo familiar y ver crecer su negocio dentro del mercado local.
texts.en:
Nora is 21 years old. She is the young head of a family and the mother of two children aged six and four. Her partner never took responsibility for paternity, so Nora had to start working at a very young age in order to guarantee her children a dignified quality of life. Because of her lack of education, the doors to the working world were closed to her, so she decided to employ herself and create her own business dedicated to making and selling arepas [corn cakes], a business that she alternates with the sale of gelatin.

She guarantees that her business is profitable, so she is asking for a loan that she will invest in buying supplies like corn and charcoal. She dreams of improving the quality of life of her nuclear family and of seeing her business grow in the local market.

loans.use: to buy supplies (corn and charcoal)

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosa, a sus 56 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos. Ama su familia y asegura que son su principal fuente de motivación para salir adelante.
Laboró por varios años en una casa de familia como empleada doméstica y posteriormente decidió retirarse y montar su propio negocio con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y compartir más tiempo con su familia.
Desde hace 7 siete años tiene una tienda de sentimientos dedicada a la venta de peluches, chocolates y esquelas. Gracias a su trabajo sus condiciones de vida han mejorado considerablemente. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido con el fin de ofrecer una mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
At 56 years of age, Rosa is the mother of three children. She loves her family and says that they are her primary source of motivation to get ahead. For many years she worked in the home of a family as a domestic employee, and then she decided to leave her job and start her own business in order to improve her earnings and spend more time with her family. 

For the last 7 years she has had a store for special occasions dedicated to selling stuffed toys, chocolates and funeral cards. Thanks to her work, her living conditions have improved considerably. She is currently asking for a loan that she will invest in buying assorted items in order to offer greater variety to her clients.

loans.use: to buy stuffed toys, chocolates and funeral cards

loans.name: Mareli Rosario

texts.es:
Mareli, vive con su madre y un hijo, ya que es madre soltera, no tiene familiares en el extranjero. Ella tiene una tienda general, venta de ropa y sandalias; el oficio de la comercialización de productos básicos lo aprendió de su madre y los otros por su cuenta; la tienda la posee desde hace 5 años, mientras que la otra actividad la realiza desde hace un año.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar productos para la tienda tales como: golosinas, azúcar, arroz,  frijoles, sal, bebidas, entre otros; este le ayudara a surtir el negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, aumentar los ingresos y con ello aportar para el hogar.
Su sueño es ampliar mas la tienda, hacerle algunas mejoras  a la casa y apoyar a su hija en los estudios.
texts.en:
Mareli lives with her mother and child because she is a single mother. She does not have relatives abroad. She has a general store, selling clothing and sandals; she learned the art of marketing commodities from her mother and the others on her own. She´s had the store for five years, and began also doing other activities last year.

The loan which she needs will allow her to buy products for the store such as candy, sugar, rice, beans, salt, drinks, and more. This will help her to restock the business and meet the needs of her customers, increasing revenue and thus providing for her home.
Her dream is to expand her store further, make some improvements to her house, and support her child in school.

loans.use: To buy sweets, sugar, rice, beans, salt, drinks, and more.

loans.name: Arnulfo Rolando

texts.es: Don Arnulfo se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 13 años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su esposa en casa propia, Don Arnulfo esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
Arnulfo has devoted himself to agriculture for the past 13 years, and that has given him the ability and the knowledge necessary to attend to his crops, mainly planting corn and beans and marketing the crops in agencies of basic grains that are near his home. The earnnings he gains from his sales help with family expenses, as he lives with his wife in their own house. Arnulfo is requesting a loan to be able to buy agricultural products that help in the planting of his crops like fertilizers and seeds so that he can make a better profit and continue to assist in the home expenditures without any limitations.
 gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, etc

loans.name: Rene Everardo
